message: Let's split the funds with a 3:1 ratio. I'll take 75% ($7,500) and you'll receive the remaining 25% ($2,500). This proposal aims for fairness while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'll offer a 50/50 split, as the value of money is decreasing rapidly. This way, we both get an equal share and can negotiate again in the next round.
